title: I’m Dating My Ex-girlfriend’s Daughter - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Betrayal   Caring Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Kind Love Interests   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Modern Day   Persistent Love Interests   Polite Protagonist   Salaryman   Short Story   Yandere   Younger Love Interests
author: 青水龍
description:
When I was a freshman in high school, I discovered that my childhood sweetheart, who I had been dating for about three years, had been cheating on me with a friend. They seemed to be having a physical relationship, and eventually, my ex-girlfriend got pregnant and dropped out of high school.

Seventeen years later, I met a girl who looked a lot like my ex-girlfriend.

>
